description:
An 11-year-old girl named Laura, along with her parents, her dog Brandy and hamster Hamtaro, moves into their new house. After their arrival in the new house, Hamtaro gets out of his cage and goes outside, where he meets a hamster named Oxnard.[4] Both Hamtaro and Oxnard fall underground, only to meet a hamster named Boss and his house. They go outside and sing a song for a female hamster named Bijou. But, after the dancing performance, Hamtaro notices something weird: Bijou winks at him and he notices, signaling her crush on him. Meanwhile, Laura and her father are walking around the city, where Laura meets Kana and buys a journal. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: とっとこ登場! ハム太郎
